snippet.title: Yume Nikki Fangame playthrough - Puchi Nikki (プチニッキ) (on an emulator)
snippet.description:
Loud noises warning.
Well, this took forever! But I am so so happy to have finally achieved one of the biggest goals I had for this channel: to get much better footage of this ONE fangame.
This was made on a DSiWare application called Puchicon mkII (otherwise known as Petit Computer in western countries). It's a very interesting piece of software where you could program your own tools and games in the BASIC programming language.
If you remember my previous video on this game, I had to use my phone to record the whole thing on the 3DS console and you could see my face on the reflection... oops. But this was because I can't just stream the 3DS console to my screen if I softmod it and expect it to still be streaming when i run a DS or DSiWare game. The console switches to a whole different unstreamable mode when that happens. So that was a bust.
But after getting a DSi and a TON of hoop-jumping I don't wish to think about, I was able to softmod it, get Petit Computer on it, get Puchi Nikki on it, dump the SDNAND, and finally boot it on the MelonDS emulator.
Believe me, I was so satisfied when I finally got it to work, I just knew I could.

Read more about this fangame: https://ynfg.yume.wiki/Puchi_Nikki_(%E3%83%97%E3%83%81%E3%83%8B%E3%83%83%E3%82%AD)_
Get this fangame on your DSi/3DS if you have Petit Computer: https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/49012211

Oh and I've unlisted the previous video on this game.
